wikipedia_page.main: John Desmond Sheridan (1903–1980) was an Irish novelist, short story writer, and humourist.  He was a frequent contributor to the Irish Independent newspaper.  In addition to his novels and essays, he also published several books of poetry, and authored a biography of poet James Clarence Mangan in 1937.Sheridan released several short stories. Most of his stories are of a humorous nature and are often about his phobias or pet hates.

response: * John D. Sheridan – short story writer and humorist
